text: Donald Newcombe (June 14, 1926 – February 19, 2019), nicknamed "Newk", was an American professional baseball pitcher in Negro league and Major League Baseball. He played for the Newark Eagles (1944–45), Brooklyn/Los Angeles Dodgers (1949–1951 and 1954–58), Cincinnati Reds (1958–1960), and Cleveland Indians (1960). Newcombe was born in Madison, New Jersey. He died on February 19, 2019 in Los Angeles from a long-illness, aged 92. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Don Newcombe
